thread.title: GroundTruth Appoints New CEO Sunil Kumar

author: cnbc.com
title: GroundTruth Appoints New CEO Sunil Kumar
text:
Global Technology Pioneer Solidifies Executive Bench Following Continued Growth and Innovation
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- GroundTruth , the leading location technology company that leverages data and insights to drive business performance, today announced the appointment of Sunil Kumar to Chief Executive Officer. Kumar, a co-founder of GroundTruth, has been serving as the company’s Chief Operating Officer for the past two years, driving double digit growth and profitability. Under Kumar’s leadership, GroundTruth increased its data scale over 300%, secured new patents to enhance location marketing and launched its self-serve platform, Ads Manager . Kumar also increased the leadership bench of GroundTruth by adding Jeff Hackett as SVP of Sales and Eric Hadley as Chief Marketing Officer. Kumar continues to bring the power of location to marketers to drive business performance.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180316005368/en/
GroundTruth appoints new CEO Sunil Kumar | www.groundtruth.com (Photo: Business Wire)
“Sunil has been a leader in the location technology space for years. As a co-founder of GroundTruth, Sunil has been instrumental in the development and growth of location-based technology and marketing for nearly 10 years,” said Steve Murray, Chairman of the GroundTruth Board . “Sunil is a pioneer in the location space and the board feels confident in his ability to lead the company, develop new products, drive revenue growth across existing and new offerings and build location marketing to its fullest potential.”
“Location will be the biggest driver of business growth within digital advertising and marketing this year and I am excited to work with this great team, our board and all our customers to help drive innovation and client satisfaction,” said Kumar . “In today’s digital world, marketers are looking for measurable results and I am committed to ensuring GroundTruth is the leader in offering innovative location-based solutions driving business results.”
In this role, Kumar will work closely with the executive team and board of directors at GroundTruth to continue market expansion, growth and innovation. Kumar will be headquartered in Mountain View, CA with global responsibilities.
Before founding GroundTruth, Kumar was a founder of V-Enable , which provided voice search solutions to a host of carriers including Verizon , Sprint and Cricket .
About GroundTruth
GroundTruth is the leading global location technology company that leverages data and insights to drive business performance. We believe in the power of Location to drive performance. With GroundTruth and our proprietary Blueprints technology businesses can leverage location data to build brand, increase sales and drive growth. GroundTruth sees 2 out 3 smartphone users in the U.S. and more than 20 billion physical visits annually across 21 countries globally. Learn more: www.groundtruth.com
